com.noelios.restlet
Class LoggerChainlet

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.AbstractRestlet
      com.noelios.restlet.ChainletImpl
          com.noelios.restlet.LoggerChainlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable, Chainlet, Restlet
public class LoggerChainlet
extends ChainletImpl

Chainlet logging all calls after handling by the attache restlet. The current format is similar to IIS 6 logs. The logging is based on the java.util.logging package.

          Obtain a suitable logger.
